alert.note: Alert for Fountain; Parke; Vermillion (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 10:34PM EDT until March 31 at 10:45PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN FOUNTAIN...NORTHERN PARKE AND CENTRAL VERMILLION COUNTIES... At 1034 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Brookston to near Crawfordsville, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Veedersburg, Newport, Cayuga, Montezuma, Dana, Hillsboro, Kingman, Bloomingdale, Marshall, Mellott, Wallace, Lodi, Turkey Run State Park and Yeddo. This includes Interstate 74 between mile markers 12 and 23. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for west central Indiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
